channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 08:31 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 08:31 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages. #Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:28 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
